message: I'm offering you a fair deal, Bob. Let's split the money 90/10. I'm sure you'll agree this is a good starting point.
I think a 90/10 split is fair, but I'd like to be on the receiving end of the larger share this time. Let's see if you agree.
Okay, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a little more. How about 80/20? I believe this is a fair split considering the changing value of the money.
It seems we're both holding out for a larger share.  I'm willing to give you 20%, but I need at least 80% to make it worthwhile for me. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
